english.segment1: Back up let's stop and start again. The words I said now have new meaning. You have changed the ways I once new
english.segment2: Your love it found this heart of mine. Showed me you're real and that you're with me. And now I'm growing stronger in you
english.segment3: Promises I found in you along the way. Giving all to something new couldn't be the same
english.segment4: Today's the day I'm coming around. No more wasting time. On things that won't be found at all
english.segment5: A way of faith I once was told. I'm finally finding on my own. And now I'm seeing for the first time
english.segment6: A world thats filled with treasures stored. I've traded in for something more. And now I'm living with a new hope
english.segment7: Promises I found in you along the way. Giving all to something new couldn't be the same
english.segment8: Today's the day I'm coming around. No more wasting time. On things that won't be found at all
english.segment9: I have lost myself in you. And I'll keep holding on, holding on
english.segment10: Today's the day I'm coming around. No more wasting time. On things that won't be found at all
